title: The Vintage & Classic Baseball Collector (12 Issues)
author: Craig M

posts.post_title: The Vintage & Classic Baseball Collector (12 Issues)
posts.post_content:
I would like to trade for trashed T206's. Please make an offer.

I have 12 issue's of VCBC including Issue #1 from March 1995. The other issues I have are 6, 9, 11, 12, 15, 16, 17, 21, 22, 24 and 26.

These are loaded full of great vintage baseball material. The Table of Contents for Issue #1:

Baseball's First Cards: Peck & Snyder Sporting Goods Trade Cards
Type Collecting Tips
Babe Ruth's 20th Anniversary As A Player
M101-1 Sporting News Supplements
The Baseball Card Hall of Fame
Chicago Black Sox - 1919 World Series: Batter By Batter Recap
History of Baseball Through Photography, Part I Cartes De Visite
Cap Anson: Baseball's First Superstar (ON COVER)
T205s: Beautiful History
etc.

Send me a pm with your offer of trashed T206's

Craig

I do not know craig

these VCBC's are some great baseball books and well worth trading for. The issue on top with Cobb on the cover has a t206 survey in it from the late 90s with over 400,000 t206s surveyed by Art Martineau.

The survey shows just how tough some of the real tough backs (top 10)are by how many show up when looking at a half million t206s.

good luck Craig
